Name: CodeListSchemeName
Description: A name for the CodeListScheme. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat the element to express names with different content, for example different names for different systems.

Name: Label
Description: A display label for the CodeListScheme. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat for labels with different content, for example, labels with differing length limitations.

Name: Description
Description: A description of the content and purpose of the CodeListScheme. May be expressed in multiple languages and supports the use of structured content.

Name: CodeListSchemeReference
Description: Allows for the inclusion of another CodeListScheme by reference.

Name: CodeListReference
Description: A structure used to associate a list of code values to specified categories. May be flat or hierarchical. A maintainable CodeList listed in the CodeListScheme in-line.

Name: CodeListGroupReference
Description: In-line description of a group of CodeLists for conceptual, administrative or other purposes.
